info.title: Budget App API
info.description: API documentation for Budget Management Application

get.description: Get all user accounts with optional filtering
Get specific account details with statistics
Get transactions for a specific account
Get account balance history over time

post.description: Manually adjust account balance to match actual balance

get.description: Get available account types and their configurations
Get summary statistics of all accounts
Get account performance metrics over time

post.description: Synchronize account balance with actual balance

200.description: Income vs expenses data retrieved successfully

items.example: The email has already been taken.

200.description: Logged out from all devices successfully

message.example: Logged out from all devices successfully

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Send password reset link to user's email

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email

items.example: We can't find a user with that email address.
This password reset token is invalid.
The current password is incorrect.

post.description: Verify user's email address using token

Get user activity summary for specified period

Export all user data in JSON format

description.example: Primary savings account for emergency fund

reminder_days.description: Days before due date to send reminder

payment_history.description: History of payments for this bill

next_due_date.description: Next calculated due date for recurring bills

days_until_due.description: Number of days until the bill is due

is_overdue.description: Whether the bill is currently overdue

last_paid_date.description: Date when the bill was last paid

total_paid.description: Total amount paid for this bill historically

payment_count.description: Number of times this bill has been paid

reminder_days.description: Days before due date to send reminder
Days before due date to send reminder

create_transaction.description: Whether to create a transaction record

payment_completion_rate.description: Percentage of bills paid on time

rollover.description: Rollover unused amount to next period

alert_threshold.description: Alert when X% of budget is reached

CreateBudgetRequest.title: Create Budget Request
CreateBudgetRequest.description: Request body for creating a new budget

category_id.description: ID of the category this budget belongs to

end_date.description: Budget end date (must be after start_date)

alert_enabled.description: Whether alerts are enabled for this budget

carry_over_unused.description: Whether to carry over unused budget amount

UpdateBudgetRequest.title: Update Budget Request
UpdateBudgetRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing budget. All fields are optional.

category_id.description: ID of the category this budget belongs to

end_date.description: Budget end date (must be after start_date)

alert_enabled.description: Whether alerts are enabled for this budget

carry_over_unused.description: Whether to carry over unused budget amount

items.example: The selected category is invalid or does not belong to you.
Budget name cannot exceed 255 characters.
Budget amount must be at least 0.01.
Budget period must be weekly, monthly, or yearly.
A budget for this category already exists for the specified period.
End date must be after the start date.
Alert threshold cannot exceed 100%.

CreateCategoryRequest.title: Create Category Request
CreateCategoryRequest.description: Request body for creating a new category

color.description: Hex color code for the category

UpdateCategoryRequest.title: Update Category Request
UpdateCategoryRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing category. All fields are optional.

type.description: Category type (cannot be changed if category has transactions)

color.description: Hex color code for the category

is_active.description: Whether the category is active (cannot deactivate if has recent transactions)

statistics.description: Category statistics (only included on show endpoint)

CategoryTransactionResource.title: Category Transaction Resource
CategoryTransactionResource.description: Transaction resource for category transactions listing

formatted_amount.description: Formatted amount with currency and sign

CategoryIconsColors.title: Category Icons and Colors
CategoryIconsColors.description: Available icons and colors for categories

BulkUpdateCategoriesRequest.title: Bulk Update Categories Request
BulkUpdateCategoriesRequest.description: Request body for bulk updating categories

MergeCategoriesRequest.title: Merge Categories Request
MergeCategoriesRequest.description: Request body for merging two categories

source_category_id.description: ID of the source category to merge from

target_category_id.description: ID of the target category to merge into

delete_source.description: Whether to delete the source category after merge

items.example: A category with this name already exists for this type.
Cannot change category type. This category has 42 transactions.
The color must be a valid hex color code (e.g., #FF0000).
Cannot deactivate category with 5 transactions in the last 30 days.

notes.example: Planning to pay off by end of year

create_transaction.description: Whether to create a transaction record

average_interest_rate.description: Average interest rate across all debts

estimated_payoff_date.description: Estimated date when all debts will be paid off

estimated_total_interest.description: Estimated total interest to be paid

DebtPayoffSchedule.title: Debt Payoff Schedule
DebtPayoffSchedule.description: Detailed payoff schedule for a debt

items.example: credit_card

recommendation.example: Consider the 36-month consolidation loan at 12% APR for maximum savings

DebtTypes.title: Debt Types Configuration
DebtTypes.description: Available debt types and their configurations

description.example: Save 6 months of living expenses for emergencies

required_monthly_contribution.description: Required monthly contribution to meet target

is_on_track.description: Whether goal is on track to meet target date

projected_completion_date.description: Projected completion based on current progress

message.example: You have used 85% of your Groceries budget for this month.

icon.description: Icon identifier for the notification type

NotificationCreateRequest.title: Notification Create Request
NotificationCreateRequest.description: Request body for creating a notification

message.example: You have used 85% of your Groceries budget for this month.

items.example: The field is required.

CreateTransactionRequest.title: Create Transaction Request
CreateTransactionRequest.description: Request body for creating a new transaction

transfer_account_id.description: ID of transfer destination account (required for transfers)

notes.example: Bought vegetables, fruits, and dairy products

attachments.description: File attachments (jpg, jpeg, png, pdf, doc, docx - max 2MB each)

recurring_type.description: Recurring frequency (required if is_recurring is true)

recurring_interval.description: Recurring interval (required if is_recurring is true)

UpdateTransactionRequest.title: Update Transaction Request
UpdateTransactionRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing transaction. All fields are optional.

BulkCreateTransactionRequest.title: Bulk Create Transactions Request
BulkCreateTransactionRequest.description: Request body for creating multiple transactions at once

BulkDeleteTransactionRequest.title: Bulk Delete Transactions Request
BulkDeleteTransactionRequest.description: Request body for deleting multiple transactions

transaction_ids.description: Array of transaction IDs to delete

ImportTransactionRequest.title: Import Transactions Request
ImportTransactionRequest.description: Request body for importing transactions from CSV

column_mappings.description: Mapping of CSV columns to transaction fields

formatted_amount.description: Formatted amount with currency and sign

items.example: The selected account does not belong to you.
Category type does not match transaction type.
Transfer account is required for transfer transactions.
The amount must be at least 0.01.
The transaction date cannot be in the future.
Cannot modify critical fields of cleared transactions older than 30 days.
